alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 7:46PM MST until February 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING will expire at 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...On and off light snow possible through the evening with up to an inch of accumulation possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Otero, eastern Las Animas, Bent, Prowers and Baca counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
